_sText:
so heres a map, enjoy

it's normal bhop mostly with some boosters and a little bit of surf. has a kz bonus made by george.

it's pretty big.

Tony Montana made some of the levels, specificly the ones with the same theme as the level with a big surf ramp. I only re-textured and altered them slightly.


I wanted to trigger it with mbhop triggers but no more space


DON'T bother rating with feedback unless you have played it with HDR settings enabled.


Start zone goes behind the green line (VERY IMPORTANT)


I will release another version for scroll in the near future.
